ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Constituent Interaction View Form Extension
ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Extends the OOB 'Constituent Interaction View Form' with custom fields
ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Styons Software

SPDataForm.c:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_VIEW_CONSTITUENTINTERACTIONVIEWFORMEXTENSION ( @ID uniqueidentifier ,@DATALOADED bit = 0 output ,@RELATIVEINFO xml = null output ,@RECORDCOUNT INT = NULL OUTPUT ,@CURRENTINDEX INT = NULL OUTPUT ) as begin set nocount on set @DATALOADED = 1 DECLARE @RELATIVES TABLE ( FIRSTNAME NVARCHAR(100) ,KEYNAME NVARCHAR(200) ,AGE INT ) INSERT INTO @RELATIVES select relcon.FIRSTNAME ,relcon.KEYNAME ,relcon.age from constituent c join interaction i on i.constituentid = c.id join relationship rel on rel.relationshipconstituentid = c.id join constituent relcon on relcon.id = rel.RECIPROCALCONSTITUENTID where i.id = @ID and relcon.ISORGANIZATION = 0 SET @RECORDCOUNT = @@ROWCOUNT SET @CURRENTINDEX = 0 SET @RELATIVEINFO = ( SELECT FIRSTNAME, KEYNAME, AGE FROM @RELATIVES FOR XML RAW('ITEM'),TYPE,ELEMENTS,ROOT('RELATIVEINFO'),BINARY BASE64 ) return 0 end
